fraud_risk_factors_identified: Management unable/unwilling to provide supporting documents
Significant related party transactions without proper documentation
Pressure to show better financial position due to accumulated losses
Complex organizational structure with multiple intercompany entities
revenue_manipulation_indicators: Revenue increased 33% in 2023 without clear business justification
Lack of supporting invoices and revenue ledger
Hospital and college revenue streams not separately verifiable
fraud_and_management_override_assessment.journal_entry_override_risk: High - based on inability to verify multiple accounting entries
fraud_and_management_override_assessment.override_of_internal_controls_risk: High - evidenced by lack of documentation and verification
fraud_and_management_override_assessment.overall_fraud_risk_assessment: HIGH - Multiple red flags including document unavailability, related party transactions, and audit limitations across three consecutive years
